title: Sociogram.org
author: Sociogram.org
created_time: April 15, 2023, 05:26:17 PMLast edit: October 18, 2024, 11:40:43 PM by Sociogram.org
content: Sociogram — Web3 multichain social network, where you can get crypto for quality content, engage with posts for USD₮ and launch memecoins for free.What is Sociogram?Sociogram is a Web3 multichain social network that provides an extended list of tools to build a like-minded community with true DeFi freedom without restrictive algorithms or shadow bans. With Sociogram, you can promote your content using Reward pools, launch your own memecoins in just a few clicks,  create Giveaways, and chat with other users. Project valueSociogram is built on DeFi principles, prioritizing freedom of speech, privacy of your personal information, and a high level of security for all users. Additionally, Sociogram aims to bring real memes back to memecoins with Meme Money Maker multichain solution.What is Meme Money Maker from Sociogram?Meme Money Maker is a multichain solution from Sociogram for launching and promoting memecoins. The creator can launch a memecoin absolutely free in just a few clicks by setting its parameters and making the first purchase at the lowest price, if desired.Advantages:No transaction and creation fee by using internal USD₮ balance10% referral programMultichain (ARB, BNB, ETH)Comment and repost memes to earn USD₮100 USD₮ bonus for successful launch after closing a bonding curve of $12,000Key Features of SociogramMultichain: supports Arbitrum, Optimism, BSC, ETH, and Polygon networks.Community building: offers lots of opportunities for content creators to build their community and start earning at ease! You can start growing your audience by memecoins creation, promoting content among real users via rewards posts, and increasing followers by launching Giveaways. Creators earn USD₮ as tips for high-quality content or by commenting and reposting other creators.Memecoins creation: with Memes Money Maker from Sociogram, you can create memecoins for free and trade without delays or extra network fees.Secure Web3 messenger: Chat with other Web3 users under top-tier privacy and security.How to earn?Reward post: earn USD₮ rewards by commenting and reposting posts or memecoins, proportional to the quality of your activities. Sociogram’s internal algorithms analyze and reward only real users bypassing the bots that flooded Web2 socials.Earn tips for great posts: 70% goes to the author of the memecoin or post, and 30% is distributed among commenters.Referral bonus: 10% from your referral's trade fee by inviting your friends to join the Mame Money Maker on Sociogram.Incentive reward: get a 100 USD₮ bonus after the memecoin reaches a bonding curve of $12,000Trade memecoins: buy/sell memecoins that grab your attention and enjoy memes at the same time.Join Our CommunityStay updated and don’t hesitate to reach out for assistance, support, collaboration, or partnership through our official Web3 and Web2 social media channels. Join Sociogram now!Website | Docs | Official Sociogram account | Official Telegram | X
